data.name: Event
desc: an event has a source that causes an event to be fired and a trigger that defines under which condition an event should be raised and an offset if the event should be raised a defined amount of time after the event is triggered.

items.name: Source
lines: this is the source for this event.

items.name: Trigger
lines: this is the trigger that fires this event.

items.name: Offset
lines: an optional offset in seconds or Timing.INDEFINITE.
This is the timespan between the triggering of the event and actually raising the event

items.name: Repeat
lines: If the Trigger is EventTrigger, this is the number of repeats after which the event is initially raised.
